narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tp Deer Valley Operations LLC is a Assisted Living Facility provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $18.8M in Medicaid payments across 3K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $18.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
